forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 98, with temperatures falling to around 96 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 101. West southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 76. Heat index values as high as 100. West southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 65. North northeast wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 62, with temperatures rising to around 65 overnight. West wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8am and 5pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 71 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. North wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 76. Northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 66, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. West wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8am and 11am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 73 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. North wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 2pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
